mapper.sql: id, role_name as roleName, role_code as roleCode, description, create_time as createTime, create_by as createBy, update_time as updateTime, update_by as updateBy, is_deleted as isDeleted
mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_role (id, role_name, role_code, description, create_time, create_by) values (#{id}, #{roleName}, #{roleCode}, #{description}, now(), #{createBy})
mapper.update:
update t_sys_role set
role_name = #{roleName},
role_code = #{roleCode},
description = #{description},
update_time = now(), update_by = #{updateBy} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select from t_sys_role t
and t.role_name like concat('%', #{roleName}, '%')
and t.is_deleted = 0
order by t.create_time desc
